description:
period of time for which the manufacturer or its representant is committed to supply software and firmware  updates  for products whose functions and substances will be modified or extended  by updates after the day of purchase.
1 the intervention by any update in the existing product shall not be accompanied by negative consequences for the user affecting the usage of the actual product version. This shall be guaranteed by the supplier of the updates.

2 In the case of impairments by an update  of  the  product,  the user shall have the possibility to keep working with his previous product version.
